create_tables.crime_table_total: CREATE TABLE total (id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, year INTEGER, state_key char(2), state CHAR(25), population INTEGER, violent_crime INTEGER, homicide INTEGER, rape_l INTEGER, rape_r INTEGER, robbery INTEGER, assault INTEGER, property INTEGER, burglary INTEGER, larceny INTEGER, vehicle INTEGER);
create_tables.crime_state_average: CREATE TABLE states_average (id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, year INTEGER, state_key char(2), state CHAR(25), population INTEGER, violent_crime INTEGER, homicide INTEGER, rape_l INTEGER, rape_r INTEGER, robbery INTEGER, assault INTEGER, property INTEGER, burglary INTEGER, larceny INTEGER, vehicle INTEGER);
create_tables.crime_average: CREATE TABLE crime_average (id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,  year INTEGER, crime char(40), average_year INTEGER, average_all INTEGER);
create_tables.income_state_median: CREATE TABLE income_state_median (id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state CHAR(25), state_key char(2), year INTEGER, income INTEGER, stand_error INTEGER)
create_tables.income_state_all_average: CREATE TABLE income_state_all_average (id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state CHAR(25), state_key char(2), year INTEGER, income INTEGER, stand_error INTEGER)

inserts_list.crime_table_total: INSERT INTO crime_table_total (id, year, state_key, state, population, violent_crime, homicide, rape_l, rape_r, robbery, assault, property, burglary, larceny, vehicle) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s , %s, %s);
inserts_list.crime_state_average: INSERT INTO crime_state_average (id, year, state_key, state, population, violent_crime, homicide, rape_l, rape_r, robbery, assault, property, burglary, larceny, vehicle) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s , %s, %s);
inserts_list.crime_average: INSERT INTO crime_average (id, year, crime, average_year, average_all) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
inserts_list.income_state_median: INSERT INTO income_state_median (id, state, state_key, year, income, stand_error) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
inserts_list.income_state_all_average: INSERT INTO income_state_all_average (id, state, state_key, year, income, stand_error) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
